name: VR Island HD for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Island HD for Google Cardboard
description:
Explore an amazing high definition island vacation in virtual reality! Hold the trigger down on your Google Cardboard device to move in the direction you are looking, or use a button on a mobile joypad. This demo works best on the iPhone 6, 6+, 6s, and 6s+, as lower end iPhones simply do not have the graphics capabilities to run this game smoothly.


*This game does not work with the magnet trigger on the 2014 Google Cardboard, please use the latest 2015 Google Cardboard with the tap trigger to play.


*** PLEASE NOTE THIS DEMO REQUIRES A HIGHER END SMART PHONE OTHERWISE THE VR HEAD TRACKING MAY BE SLOW DUE TO THE HIGH DEFINITION GRAPHICS *** PLEASE USE THE NEW VERSION OF GOOGLE CARDBOARD, HOLDING THE TRIGGER DOWN FOR MOVEMENT ***


COMPATIBLE VR HEADSETS
Google Cardboard
Stooksy
Durovis Dive
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru
